sources.title: Atomic Attack
sources.description: Title: "The Motorola Television Hour" Atomic Attack Summary: A family living 50 miles away try to flee from the fallout of an atomic bomb that fell on New York City. Directed by: Ralph Nelson Actors: Phyllis Thaxter, Robert Keith, Walter Matthau Production Company: Office of Civil Defense Release Date: Episode aired 18 May 1954 Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 A family living 50 miles away try to flee from the fallout of an atomic bomb that fell on New York City.
